item.title: Hi :) I want to get the greek letter "phi" tattooed, because it's the number of the golden ratio. Now I don't know if theres a difference between the lowercase letter and the uppercase letter. Not that I have a tattoo of the uppercase Phi, when the lowercase one is the actual symbol for the golden ratio. Or is it the same? Hope you Can help :)
